title: Artificial intelligence to measure left atrial ejection fraction in transthoracic echocardiography videos and its usefulness to assess thromboembolic risk
details: K Pieszko, B Makowski, B Uzieblo-Zyczkowska… - European Heart Journal …, 2025
abstract: Background Left atrial (LA) area measurement in 2D echocardiography is commonly used to estimate LA volume, plays a crucial role in diagnosis and has prognostic implication in a wide range of cardiovascular diseases including thromboembolic risk …
